pl.polsl.java.proj1.view.language

Interface LanguageImplementer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    English, Polish

    public interface LanguageImplementer
    Implementer of the bridge-pattern used to display communicates in different languages.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Marczyk Grzegorz

      Procedure asks the user for the number which has to be tested for primality.

    • Method Detail

      • showTestResults

        void showTestResults(java.lang.String testedNumber,
                     java.lang.String testedOnValue,
                     boolean resultOfTest)
        Procedure prints information about recent Fermat's test with the results.
        Parameters:
        testedNumber - The number which was tested ("p" in formula).
        testedOnValue - Value according to which the test was performed ("a" in formula).
        resultOfTest - Result in true-false whether the test was positive or not.

      • showMenu

        void showMenu()
        Procedure prints the main menu of the application.

        Procedure prints language in which interface is currently displayed.
        Parameters:
        language - Language in String.

      • askForFermatNumberForTest

        void askForFermatNumberForTest()
        Procedure asks the user for the number according to which the primality test has to be performed. Should happen if user chooses to put the number by himself, not automatically by the application.

      • showGeneratedNumberToTest

        void showGeneratedNumberToTest()
        Procedure prints the number "a" in Fermat's test which was generated automatically by the application. Should happen after user chooses application to generate the number for him.

      • showFermatTestOptions

        void showFermatTestOptions()
        Procedure displays the available options about the Fermat's test.
